title: Band, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop and twist with twist return
description: Band of Point d'Alençon worked with allover design of elaborated leaf and flower forms and dominating centralized pomegranate motifs. Irregular edge formed by leaf and flower forms.
